import { DateTimePickerSheetImage, DateWithTimeImage, DateSingleImage, DateRangeImage } from "/src/components/Images";


# Date Time Picker Sheet
Toggles allow user to turn an option on or off.

<div style={{backgroundColor: 'white',border: '1px solid #F4F6F8', borderRadius: 16, padding: 32, marginBottom: 24}}>
   <DateTimePickerSheetImage />
</div>

Sample using DateTimePickerSheet with State
```kotlin
import com.waresix.lib.ui.component.sheet.datetimepicker.DateTimePickerSheet

...

data class State(
	@Saved val assigmentDate: Pair<Date, Date>? = null,
) : UiState

...

DateTimePickerSheet
	.dateRangePicker()
	.title("Your title here")
	.calendarType(CalendarType.VIEW_ONLY | CalendarType.SINGLE_DATE_PICKER | CalendarType.RANGE_DATE_PICKER)
	.isShowTimePicker(true | false)
	.isShowResetButton(isShow)
	.minimumDate(Date())
	.maxRangeSelection(1, DateUnit.DAY | DateUnit.WEEK | DateUnit.MONTH | DateUnit.YEAR)
	.selectedDate(state.assigmentDate?.first)
	.selectedEndDate(state.assigmentDate?.second)
	.onPositiveButtonClicked { startDate, endDate ->
		// your logic here on 'Simpan' button clicked
	}
	.minimumDate(Date())
	.maximumDate(Date())
	.show(context)

...
```

## Date Range Picker

<div style={{backgroundColor: 'white', borderRadius: 16, padding: 32, marginBottom: 24}}>
   <DateRangeImage />
</div>

```kotlin
var rangeDate: Pair<Date?, Date?>? = null
DateTimePickerSheet
	.dateRangePicker()
	.title("Pilih Rentang Tanggal")
	.selectedDate(rangeDate?.first)
	.selectedEndDate(rangeDate?.second)
	.maxRangeSelection(3, DateUnit.MONTH)
	.onPositiveButtonClicked { startDate, endDate ->
		rangeDate = Pair(startDate, endDate)
		// TODO: your code here
	}
	.show(it.context)
```
<br/><br/>

## Date Time Picker

<div style={{backgroundColor: 'white', borderRadius: 16, padding: 32, marginBottom: 24}}>
   <DateWithTimeImage />
</div>

```kotlin
var dateTime: Date = Date()
DateTimePickerSheet
	.dateTimePicker()
	.title("Pilih Tanggal & Waktu")
	.selectedDate(dateTime)
	.maximumDate(Date())
	.onPositiveButtonClicked { date, _ ->
		// TODO: Your code here
	}
	.show(it.context)
```
<br/><br/>

## Single Date Picker

<div style={{backgroundColor: 'white', borderRadius: 16, padding: 32, marginBottom: 24}}>
   <DateSingleImage />
</div>

```kotlin
var singleDate: Date = Date()
DateTimePickerSheet
	.datePicker()
	.title("Pilih Tanggal")
	.selectedDate(singleDate)
	.onPositiveButtonClicked { date, _ ->
		singleDate = date
		// TODO: Your code here
	}
	.show(it.context)
```
